name: WorldHappinessPython
description: The project involves using data from the World Happiness Report in applications related to data analysis, data science, data mining as well as utilizing machine learning methods, including supervised learning (regression) and unsupervised learning (clustering).

name: WorldHappinessR
description: The project involves using data from the World Happiness Report in applications related to data analysis, data science, data mining as well as utilizing machine learning methods, including supervised learning (regression) and unsupervised learning (clustering).

name: Formula 1 Data Exploration
description: Processing large datasets of Formula 1 historic data with usage of Python and its libraries(e.g., Pandas, NumPy, Folium , Plotly).Including visualizations of many records&remarkable moments of this international racing sport.
